content: Usually they are all brought about by one’s own misdeeds and nothing more. For me, however, this is not the case; I am a man of great feeling, who values his word, and is straightforward and unrestrained, but these qualities have become the causes of problems for me.
translations: ita:Di solito sono tutti provocati da propri misfatti e nulla più. Per me, però, questo non è il caso; Io sono un uomo di gr
